pic1_alt: Chart of Predicted probability that sample was written by AI for each GPT detector tool for native English speakers and non-native speakers. Detectors are Originality.ai, Quill.org, Sapling, OpenAI, Crossplag, GPTZero, ZeroGPT. For all detectors there is a much higher probability that the detectors classify non-native English writers as written by an AI.
pic2_alt: Bar chart of percent of human-written misclassified as AI generated for different GPT detectors for real TOEFL essays and real US 8th-grade essays. Detectors are Originality.ai, Quill.org, Sapling, OpenAI, Crossplag, GPTZero, ZeroGPT. For all detectors, real TOEFL essays were misclassified between 40% and 75% more often than real 8th-grade essays. Originality.ai misclassifies the most at 76% and ZeroGPT the least at 48%.
